titles.title: PRECEPT Nurses Act
PRECEPT Nurses Act
Providing Real-World Education and Clinical Experience by Precepting Tomorrowâ€™s Nurses Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to create a tax credit for nurse preceptors.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committee on Appropriations, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
